Entries.Sun8: The Witch and I have a history together. Much of it is undesirable.#$b#The Witch was the one to seal me away to that forbidden place in the past.#$e#My pride is getting in the way of what I know is the greater good, but it's hard to make amends in our relationship.$7

Entries.Good_6: I need to have a talk with a certain witch.$7#$b#I swear I saw a Junimo peeking in from outside our window! Why won't they leave me alone!?$a#$e#...You think those little things are cute, don't you? Well, I'm obviously cuter.$l
Entries.Neutral_4: I need to have a talk with a certain witch.$7#$b#I swear I saw a Junimo peeking in from outside our window!$a#$e#...You think those little things are cute, don't you? Well, I'm obviously cuter.$l
Entries.spouseRoom_Lucikiel: Hey, @. The circle on the ground helps me regenerate mana.$u#$e#Who knows? Maybe it will help you restore stamina in the near future.$u#$e#Hmm... Rasmodia said something about being in 'multi-player mode' for that to work...$9

Entries.1027705/f Lucikiel 2000/t 1800 2350/w su: junimoKart_ghostMusic/-100 -100/farmer 87 30 2 Lucikiel 82 39 3 Wizard -999 -999 2 Junimo -998 -999/addConversationTopic Rehabilitation 30/skippable/viewport 87 39 true/addLantern 735 83 35 1/addLantern 735 83 36 1/removeTemporarySprites/move farmer 0 5 2/shake Lucikiel 1500/speak Lucikiel "S i l e n c e . . .$7"/emote farmer 8/speak Lucikiel "Even now, I continue to be haunted by ghosts of the past. The Jailer of Despair relishes in their despair while I feast upon their dreaded misery.$7"/textAboveHead Lucikiel "HahAhaHA!"/move farmer 0 4 3/emote farmer 40/pause 200/quickQuestion #Lucikiel...?(break)pause 1/shake Lucikiel 2500/speak Lucikiel "In this tumultuous world, why am I the only one to remain? Their voices still do not fade away. The noise is unbearable!$8"/faceDirection Lucikiel 1/textAboveHead Lucikiel "HaHAhaHA!"/move Lucikiel 4 0 1/speak Lucikiel "Do you hear them? Their alluring whispers of dark promises?$8"/speak Lucikiel "I'll do anything to become stronger, but their voices echo louder and louder until I'm drowning in a cacophony of sounds. Someone... MaKe iT sTOp.$8"/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Lucikiel 1/shake Lucikiel 2000/speak Lucikiel "Annihilate. Obliterate.           D e s t r o y.$8"/jump farmer/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/startJittering/pause 400/move farmer 1 0 1/speed farmer 4/move farmer 1 0 1/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection farmer 3/startJittering/speed Lucikiel 1/move Lucikiel 2 0 1/pause 1000/quickQuestion #Lucikiel, it's me!#Snap out of it!#Please wake up!(break)pause 1\jump farmer(break)pause 1\jump farmer(break)pause 1\jump farmer/pause 300/shake Lucikiel 2000/pause 2000/speak Lucikiel "...Wait. @? You shouldn't be here. It's dangerous.$7"/stopJittering/shake Lucikiel 2000/pause 500/textAboveHead Lucikiel "...I'm dangerous."/pause 1000/pause 1000/speak Lucikiel "Don't go. Stay here with me, until it gets better... Please.$s"/emote farmer 16/speed farmer 1/move farmer -1 0 3/emote Lucikiel 40/stopMusic/speak Lucikiel "When you are around, the ramblings in my head become silent... When you speak, it quiets everything else."/emote farmer 8/stopMusic/shake Lucikiel 3000/pause 1700/playMusic desolate/move Lucikiel -1 0 0/shake Lucikiel 1000/pause 500/pause 1500/shake Lucikiel 10/pause 500/speak Lucikiel "Sorry about that... Once in a while, I forget where I am and lose control of myself. When it happens, I need to go into isolation.$10"/emote farmer 8/move Lucikiel 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Lucikiel "You've probably seen it happen a few times. Times where I slip and show that beastly side of me. My inner darkness."/move farmer -1 0 3 true/move farmer 0 1 2/speak Lucikiel "It's strange. It's easier to regain control and resist the temptation whenever you're around.$10"/faceDirection Lucikiel 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Lucikiel "Your presence at the plaza when I was summoned is testament to that.$s"/speak Lucikiel "I'll do anything to be rid of this curse. Perhaps..."/emote Lucikiel 40/pause 200/faceDirection Lucikiel 2/speak Lucikiel "Nevermind... I've shared more than I wanted to. There must be something in the air tonight.$s"/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 8/speak Lucikiel "...forget I said anything."/emote Lucikiel 40/pause 1000/stopMusic/playMusic ocean/shake Lucikiel 50000/pause 1000/speak Lucikiel "--! the darkness is swirling back to me in full force...!$10"/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 8/pause 400/showFrame Lucikiel 29/speak Lucikiel "I can't suppress it any longer! Get away from me!$7"/stopMusic/playMusic bigDrums/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 500/shake Lucikiel 10/showFrame Lucikiel 29/playSound wand/screenFlash 3/showFrame Wizard 16/warp Wizard 87 34/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 16/pause 300/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/move Wizard 0 1 2/move farmer 0 -1 0 true/move Wizard 0 1 2 false/speak Wizard "@! Get away from that demon. He's a danger to us all!"/speak Lucikiel "Rasmodia... You're an eyesore as usual. Get out of my sight.$7"/faceDirection Lucikiel 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Lucikiel 0/faceDirection farmer 1/jump farmer/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause Wizard 1/playSound wand/warp Wizard -999 -999/pause 150/addObject 84 38 362 1/playSound flameSpellHit/pause 250/removeTemporarySprites/faceDirection Wizard 1/screenFlash .5/playSound wand/warp Wizard 88 39/pause 500/emote farmer 16/speak Wizard "I advise you, @. Avoid the demon with the golden eyes. You do not want to attract his attention."/showFrame Lucikiel 16/pause 300/playSound coldSpell/showFrame Lucikiel 24/playSound flameSpell/pause 300/animate Lucikiel false true 25 25 25 26 26 26 25 25 26 26 27 27 27 25 25 26 26 26 27 27 27 26 26 26 25 25 25 27 27 27 25 25 26 26 25 25 27 27 26 26 25 25 25 26 26 27 27 27 25 25 25/speak Lucikiel "Get away from him!$7^Get away from her!$7"/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 1 2/warp Wizard -999 -999/screenFlash .5/pause 200/addObject 88 38 362 1/playSound flameSpell/pause 200/pause 100/removeTemporarySprites/addObject 89 38 362 1/playSound flameSpell/pause 250/removeTemporarySprites/addObject 90 38 362 1/playSound flameSpellHit/pause 250/removeTemporarySprites/pause 250/playSound flameSpellHit/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 300/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/playSound wand/screenFlash 3/showFrame Wizard 16/warp Wizard 87 35/stopAnimation Lucikiel/showFrame Lucikiel 29/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/showFrame Lucikiel 0/speed farmer 3/move farmer 0 -1 0 true/speed Lucikiel 3/move Lucikiel 1 0 1 false/move farmer -2 0 0 true/move Lucikiel 2 0 0 false/stopMusic/playMusic night_market/speak Wizard "You have certainly changed a lot in the past hundred years. You're better at expressing emotions. However, you're still a dangerous liability."/speak Lucikiel "Don't bully me now, Rasmodia. I'm quite sensitive and you'll make me cry.$8"/speak Wizard "Enough. You're struggling to awaken your inner darkness, as unstable your power is. I could sense you all the way from my abode."/speak Lucikiel "I don't need your concern. If it means getting my revenge, then it's a price I will gladly pay.$7"/speak Wizard "This is the problem! You're a ticking time bomb just waiting to explode. I'm playing a dangerous game with people's lives by allowing you in this valley."/speak Lucikiel "So what? Are you going to seal me away again? Or perhaps you think I just need a hug to be redeemed.$8"/speak Wizard "I am aware of the sacrifices you have made, Lucikiel. They allow me to hope, but I fear you may be no different from the past."/emote farmer 8/speak Wizard "We had to seal you away to that timeless place because of your rampage. I am aware of your grievances, but time has moved on without you. Keep up or get left behind."/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Lucikiel 1/emote Lucikiel 12/faceDirection Lucikiel 3/speak Lucikiel "Is that all you have to say, The Witch of Sage?$a"/move Wizard 0 1 2/speak Wizard "Please forgive me, Lucikiel. It was better this way. Even now, people think that the 'Golden Eyes' are just a myth. A tragedy disguised as a legend."/faceDirection Lucikiel 0/speak Lucikiel "...I get it. No one wants another repeat of history.$7"/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/screenFlash 1.5/warp Junimo 88 36/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 16/jump Junimo/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 250/emote Junimo 20/showFrame Wizard 0/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "This little one has been monitoring your progress. So far, the Junimo only reported good things since your return."/pause 500/jump Junimo/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 500/textAboveHead Lucikiel "That little spy..."/pause 500/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/speak Wizard "We will give you another chance, Lucikiel. If you are willing to change, to adapt to life here, you are more than welcome to stay."/pause 500/jump Junimo/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 500/emote Lucikiel 40/speak Lucikiel "...That is my wish. To live the rest of my life here and fulfill my promise to Clint."/speak Wizard "Lucikiel, I am certain you will awaken from your darkness and transcend into the light."/move Wizard 0 2 2/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Wizard "The forest spirits say that @ played a huge role in your rehabilitation. You are fortunate, Lucikiel. Perhaps @ will be the one to change your fate."/emote Lucikiel 8/textAboveHead Wizard "Farewell."/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/jump Junimo/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 1000/playSound wand/screenFlash 3/warp Wizard -999 -999/warp Junimo -999 -999/pause 2000/faceDirection Lucikiel 1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/stopMusic/playMusic ocean/emote Lucikiel 40/speak Lucikiel "'Rehabilitation', huh?"/pause 50/specificTemporarySprite krobusBeach/pause 100/speed Lucikiel 1/move Lucikiel -2 0 3/speed Lucikiel 1/move Lucikiel 0 1 2/pause 1000/speed farmer 1/move farmer 0 1 3/speed farmer 1/move farmer -2 0 2/viewport move 0 1 1500/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/stopMusic/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 1500/speak Lucikiel "To be honest, @, I don't like the idea of you trying to manipulate my thoughts.$10"/faceDirection Lucikiel 2/emote Lucikiel 40/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Lucikiel "However, I've been reflecting on our talks and the ways of life around here. It's peaceful. And I want to be a part of the that."/faceDirection Lucikiel 1/speak Lucikiel "Perhaps 'rehabilitation' isn't quite too far from the mark.$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 250/speed Lucikiel 1/move Lucikiel 1 0 1/pause 250/speak Lucikiel "Our people have been enemies for centuries, @. I have a lifetime's worth of anger towards humanity to sort through.$s"/speak Lucikiel "It will be difficult, but for now, I'll choose to trust in you.$h"/faceDirection Lucikiel 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 2500/emote Lucikiel 60/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1800/speak Lucikiel "...Don't make me regret my decision.$l"/pause 2000/end
